fields.name: ref_number
fields.title: Reference Number
fields.description: This field is populated by the organization. It is a unique reference number given to each line item in the spreadsheet. Having a unique identifier for each item will allow users locate a specific item in the registry should they need to modify or delete.

fields.name: disclosure_group
fields.title: Disclosure Group
fields.description: This field will display the group to which the individual belongs.

fields.name: title_en
fields.title: Title (English)
fields.description: This field will display the position title of the person who travelled, in English

fields.name: name
fields.title: Name
fields.description: This field will display the name of the  person who travelled

fields.name: purpose_en
fields.title: Purpose of Travel (English)
fields.description: A short description, in English, of the reason for the trip. The description should be succinct (one line if possible) and provide users with a general sense of the trip's purpose. Use of acronyms should be avoided.

fields.name: start_date
fields.title: Travel Start Date
fields.description: To cover the date the travel started

fields.name: end_date
fields.title: Travel End Date
fields.description: To cover the date the travel ended (can be the same as travel start date)

fields.name: destination_en
fields.title: Place visited (English)
fields.description: To include name of the first place visited during the trip in question, in English.

fields.name: destination_2_en
fields.title: Second place visited (English)
fields.description: To include name of second place visited during the trip in question, in English.

fields.name: destination_other_en
fields.title: Other places visited (English)
fields.description: To include names of all other places visited during the trip in question, in English.

fields.name: airfare
fields.title: Airfare
fields.description: Total cost of any airline tickets, if applicable.

fields.name: other_transport
fields.title: Other transportation
fields.description: Total cost of any other forms of transportation (for example, train, bus, vehicle rental, private vehicle, taxis, etc), if applicable.

fields.name: meals
fields.title: Meals and incidentals
fields.description: Total cost of meals and incidentals expenses.

fields.name: other_expenses
fields.title: Other expenses
fields.description: Total cost of all other items that are not covered by the above fields (for example. special passport, visas, associated photos, calls to the office or home, dependant care where applicable, etc.).

fields.name: total
fields.title: Total Amount
fields.description: The total of the amount listed above.

fields.name: additional_comments_en
fields.title: Additional Comments English
fields.description: This field may be populated with additional comments in English.
